Procedure to figure out a unique uid for a new service account

  1. This is a very poorly written script.
    1. It takes about 3-4 minutes to run
    2. Currently it prints unique ids between “6000 and 7000”
  2. Login to pcdcunxaxap01
    ssh pcdcunxaxap01
  3. For a single uid, Execute this command. There is no need to run this as root, I recommend running it as your own account(But make sure you have ssh keys setup )
    /prod/images/scripts/picknextuid
  4. If you need multiple, pass an argument
    /prod/images/scripts/picknextuid <number_of_unique_ids_needed>
